doc:
Noah Wyle https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Noah_Wyle 0 Noah Strausser Speer Wyle (; born June 4, 1971) is an American film, television, and theatre actor. He is known for his roles as Dr. John Carter in ER and as Tom Mason in Falling Skies. He has also played Steve Jobs in the docudrama Pirates of Silicon Valley (1999), Dr. Kenneth Monnitoff in Donnie Darko (2001), and Flynn Carsen in The Librarian franchise. Noah_Strausser_Speer_Wyle ( ; born June_4 , 1971 ) is an_American_film , television , and theatre_actor . He is_known for his_roles as Dr._John_Carter in ER and as Tom_Mason in Falling_Skies . He has_also_played Steve_Jobs in the_docudrama_Pirates of Silicon_Valley ( 1999_) , Dr._Kenneth_Monnitoff in Donnie_Darko_(_2001_) , and Flynn_Carsen in The_Librarian_franchise .
